name: Adventures in the Light & Dark
description: A surreal kinetic novel of mystery, horror, and dark humor.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit Processor: Intel Core i5 (VR) | Intel Core i3 (Desktop) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (VR) | GeForce GTX 970 (Desktop) Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
